name: Gems and Crystals
description:
Gems and Crystals for Minecraft 1.20.2 adds new gems and crystals to find within your Minecraft world!
With this mod installed, you can find rubies, sapphires, topaz, amethyst, and quartz within the caves of the Minecraft Overworld.
Once you find these new gems and crystals you can craft tools and armour to use as you explore your Minecraft world
Enjoy
